reviewText: Antonio Banderas is THE best Zorro of all times!!!!!!!
Love the movie, no matter how many times we watch it.  One of Banderas' few good movies.
Everthing was nice  I like the movie  and the seller for understanding  the mistake i don't  know  what happen I just want the movie  I will order again soon  5 star

This was purchased for my young great-nephew who is currently obsessed with sword fights!  His mom says he demands them played every day as he dons his own mask and sword to join in the fun!  He joyfully shouts, "Ting-Ting" as the swords clash. I'd say that's a great review!

I saw both of these movies and I thought they were really good.  They are some of Antonio Banderas' finest work.  My favorite parts from "Mask of Zorro" were when Zorro's horse refused to obey him and practically ignored him.  Both movies are full of action scenes that kept my attention throughout the length of both films.  I recommend both of the DVDs for any movie lover.

This a perfect purchase for anyone who loves Zorro.  It includes the Mask of Zorro and the Legend of Zorro both excellent movies.  This is the best buy 2 movies for only $25.99 what a steal.  Awesome amazon.com rules.
